title: WHO: 47.4 lakh India Covid deaths, nearly 10 times official count - The Indian Express
content:
1. WHO: 47.4 lakh India Covid deaths, nearly 10 times official count  The Indian Express
  2. India Has Max Covid Deaths, Says WHO; Incorrect, Says Government  NDTV
  3. India Hits Back At WHO Reports Claiming Excess COVID Deaths; Calls It 'Scientifically Questionable'  Republic World
  4. No medical care for 45% of recorded deaths in 2020, highest ever: New data  The Indian Express
  5. "Questionable": India Objects To WHO Claims Of 4.7 Million Covid Deaths  NDTV
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: In its report on excess deaths due to Covid, WHO said that an estimated 1.5 crore people are likely to have succumbed to the direct or indirect impact of the disease globally during the first two years of the pandemic â€” instead of the 54 lakh that have been recorded officially by countries separately.
